mapper.select: SELECT * FROM trip_awards ORDER BY trip_awards_articleno ASC LIMIT #{rank - 1}, 1
SELECT * FROM trip_awards ORDER BY trip_awards_likes DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM trip_awards WHERE DATE_FORMAT(trip_awards_writedate, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') ORDER BY trip_awards_hits DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT trip_awards_firstawardsno AS firstAwardsNo, trip_awards_secondawardsno AS secondAwardsNo, trip_awards_monthlyawardsno AS monthlyAwardsNo, trip_awards_photoawardsno AS photoAwardsNo, trip_awards_title AS title, trip_awards_articleno AS articleNo, trip_awards_imagefileno AS imgFileno, trip_awards_content AS content FROM trip_awards ORDER BY trip_awards_writedate DESC

SELECT trip_awards_articleNo AS articleNo, trip_awards_imgFileno AS imgFileno, trip_awards_title AS title, trip_awards_content AS content FROM trip_awards WHERE 1 = 1
AND trip_awards_articleNo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{articleNo}, '%')
AND trip_awards_imgFileno LIKE CONCAT('%', #{imgFileno}, '%')
AND trip_awards_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
AND trip_awards_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%')
ORDER BY trip_awards_articleNo DESC
